    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(T label)
        Adds a label to the dependency graph if it is not already present.

      • getOrAddVertex

        protected DependencySorter.Vertex<T> getOrAddVertex(T label)
        Retrieve the vertex for the given label. If the label did not already have a vertex, this will create a new vertex for the label.
        Parameters:
        label - The label to use.
        Returns:
        The vertex for the given label.

      • addDependency

        public void addDependency(T label,
                 T dependencyLabel)
        Adds a dependency from label to dependencyLabel. If there is not a vertex for either label in the dependency graph, then one is added.

      • addEdge

        protected void addEdge(DependencySorter.Vertex<T> out,
           DependencySorter.Vertex<T> in)
        Internal implementation of adding an edge to the graph.

      • sort

        public java.util.List<T> sort()
                       throws DependencyCycleException
        Throws:
        DependencyCycleException
